desc: Whether you’re a certified first responder, experienced paramedic, avid hiker or peewee soccer coach, safety and preparedness are always top priority. Take ‘just in case’ to new levels of precaution with a high-quality First Responder Kits from Scherber.

layout.text: Whether you’re a certified first responder, experienced paramedic, avid hiker or peewee soccer coach, safety and preparedness are always top priority. Take ‘just in case’ to new levels of precaution with a high-quality First Responder Bag from Scherber.
